entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
